member.name: T:FCartographer.AddLayerMenu
member.summary:
Window for adding a new layer with specified settings.
This class, when instantiated, takes the parent form as input, and interfaces with the project.

member.summary: Holds the reference to the parent Form1 object, aka the main program.

member.summary: Closes window

member.name: T:FCartographer.Form1
member.summary: Partial Class: Form1 This part of Form1 controls the elevation brush settings

The main user interface of the program.
Holds the canvas, navigation menues, tool menues, and all non-dialogue ui elements used to interface with user projects.
This part of Form1 is used for the bar at the top of the form, handling File, Edit, View, etc.
This part of Form1 is used for Layer control
This part of Form1 is used for navigating the canvas; zoom, scroll, etc.
This part of Form1 controls the visibility of the panels

member.name: M:FCartographer.Form1.StrengthControl_Scroll(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Sets the opacity for the Terrain Brush from Terrain Brush strength Slider

member.summary: Sets the size for the Terrain Brush from Terrain Brush size Slider

member.name: M:FCartographer.Form1.HeightControl_Scroll(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Sets the Target Height for the Terrain Brush from Terrain Brush size Slider

member.summary: Initializes Menu for adding new layer

member.name: M:FCartographer.Form1.AddLayer_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Adds a layer to the project

member.name: M:FCartographer.Form1.DisplayLayers
member.summary: Places a panel for each layer in the layer pane for user navigation. Also places references to each layer panel object in List of layer display objects.

member.name: M:FCartographer.Form1.ClearLayerPane
member.summary: Calls Dispose() on every Layer Panel in the viewer

member.name: M:FCartographer.Form1.LayerPanelChild_Select(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary:
Event that fires when a child of a layer pane is clicked.
This allows the user to click anywhere on a layer rather than just the empty space in the background.
Gets the layer pane, then calls LayerPanel_Select, which is the event that fires when the user clicks on the panel normally.

member.name: M:FCartographer.Form1.LayerPanel_Select(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Event that fires when a layer pane is clicked. It calls project.SelectLayer() to select the layer clicked.

member.name: M:FCartographer.Form1.DisplaySelectedLayer
member.summary: Turns all layers the default layer panel color, and colors the currently selected the selected layer color.

member.name: M:FCartographer.Form1.DeleteLayer_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Event that fires when a delete layer button was clicked. Calls the project object to delete the selected layer.

member.name: M:FCartographer.Form1.LayerUp_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Event that fires when a move layer up button was clicked. Calls the project object to switch the selected layer with the one above.

member.name: M:FCartographer.Form1.LayerDown_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Event that fires when a move layer down button was clicked. Calls the project object to switch the selected layer with the one below.

member.name: M:FCartographer.Form1.UpdateCanvasLocation
member.summary: Applies this class' internal canvas location to the canvas

member.summary: Sets this class' internal canvas value. input: int x -> x value of desired canvas location int y -> y value of desired canvas location

member.summary: Sets the x value of this class' internal canvas value. input: int x -> x value of desired canvas location

member.name: M:FCartographer.Form1.SetCanvasYLocation(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the y value of this class' internal canvas value. input: int y -> y value of desired canvas location

member.summary: Sets the dimension of the scroll bar based on the Canvas width, height, and the LargeChange variable in each.
